snippet: A novel method known as whole genome sequencing focuses on genes that drive a cancer, not the tissues or organ where it originates.
abstract: Emerging cancer diagnostic process known as whole genome sequencing attempts to discover the genes that drive a specific instance of cancer, rather than focusing on the tissue or organ where the cancer originates; procedure remains expensive but experts believe that it will eventually become a standard part of cancer treatment (Series: Genetic Gamble).
lead_paragraph: A novel method known as whole genome sequencing focuses on genes that drive a cancer, not the tissues or organ where it originates.

headline.seo: In Gene Sequencing Treatment for Leukemia, Glimpses of the Future
headline.main: In Treatment for Leukemia, Glimpses of the Future
headline.print_headline: In Leukemia Treatment, Glimpses of the Future
